LanguageData.MM_CreateMechanoidChip.label: Make mechanoid AI chip
LanguageData.MM_CreateMechanoidChip.description: Crafts an AI chip for repurposing dead mechanoids. Needs silver for highest quality circuitry.
LanguageData.MM_ChipCrawlerCleaning.label: Chip crawler for cleaning
LanguageData.MM_ChipCrawlerCleaning.description: Restores a destroyed mechanoid with a new AI chip. This allows it to perform a singular function.
